attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To what purpose does the S.O.R.N serve?
To make the goverment richer!
If a vehicle is S.O.R.N.ed, does it stop the vehicle from being driven? 
No, but it can cost you a fine if you forget to S.O.R.N & you're not guaranteed to get a reminder.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
